from Products.ERP5Type.Log import log
 order = state_change['object']
 portal = order.getPortalObject()
 
 vifib_trade_condition = 'sale_trade_condition_module/vifib_trade_condition'
 ### STEP 1: does this order have a client-specific Trade Condition
 trade_condition = order.getSpecialiseValue(portal_type="Sale Trade Condition")
 custom_trade_condition = None
 if trade_condition is not None:
 if trade_condition.getDestinationSection() == order.getDestinationSection():
 # The client in this trade condition is the client of the order
 custom_trade_condition = trade_condition
 
 if custom_trade_condition is None:
 # If no trade condition or generic trade condition
 # try to find existing trade condition
 trade_condition_list = portal.portal_catalog(
 destination_section_relative_url=order.getDestinationSection(),
 validation_state="validated",
 specialise_relative_url=vifib_trade_condition,
 portal_type='Sale Trade Condition')
 if len(trade_condition_list):
 custom_trade_condition = trade_condition_list[0].getObject()
 
 if custom_trade_condition is None:
 # nothing found then create a new custom trade condition
 custom_trade_condition = portal.sale_trade_condition_module.newContent(specialise=vifib_trade_condition,
 destination_section_relative_url=order.getDestinationSection(),
 title="ViFiB Custom Conditions",
 portal_type='Sale Trade Condition')
 
 if custom_trade_condition is None:
 raise ValueError('It was impossible to generate custom trade condition.')
 if order.getSpecialise(portal_type="Sale Trade Condition") != custom_trade_condition.getRelativeUrl():
 order.setSpecialiseValue(custom_trade_condition)
 
 if portal.portal_workflow.isTransitionPossible(custom_trade_condition, 'validate'):
 custom_trade_condition.validate()
